short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send personalized messages to your Linkedin connections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension sends automated cold messages in linkedin with a saved template.
Save your template on coldmessager.com. Login into our chrome extension,just click message button to send your linkedin cold message.
